      • Office

        Parameters:
        rN - The room number to identify the office.
        bldng - The name of the building where the office is located.
        flr - The floor where the office is located.
        occupants - The occupants of the office.
        cant - One occupant of the office.

      • Office

        public Office(Person occupant)
        Constructor. Initialize the room number, the building, the floor and one occupant with the indicated values, and the attributes with a default value.
        Parameters:
        occupant - The occupant of the office. This occupant has the room number of his office, and it can be used to identify this office. After it, initialize the occupants array and add the occupant.
